passives.name: Necrophage Hunger
passives.description: The drowner has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

passives.name: Limited Amphibiousness
passives.description: The drowner can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The drowner makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
